oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Engagement announcement of Kathryn Parrish, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1933
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scrapbook page related to the Parrish-Thurman wedding announcement and informal parties honoring the bride-to-be, Miss Kathryn Parrish, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. William McMurray Parrish. The bride-to-be was engaged to James Collins Thurman (Mr. and Mrs. James Collins Thurman, Jr.) and the wedding would take place on June 6th, 1933. Forms part of the James C. Thurman Collection. 1 scrapbook page ; b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Parrish, Kathryn; Thurman family; Thurman, James C.
